Posted By: Gcrudaplaneswalker (9/22/2011 9:34:51 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
So, I picked up some Innistrad and M12 packs the other day. In the last M12 pack I opened I finally got a Chandra, and in my first Innistrad pack I pulled this. I feel like this is the universe telling me to put together some kind of RB control/burn deck. Maybe discard [Chandra's Phoenix](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chandra's Phoenix) with Liliana's +1 and bring it back into my hand with Chandra's? I'll have to look for other, more game ending combos.  
  
Okay, fine, I actually just want to see if having them both in play at the same time gives me the kind of nerd erection that I think it will. DON'T JUDGE ME!
posts.html:

I'll have to look for other, more game ending combos.

posts.post_content:
@ravens8856  
  
The card discarded with Liliana's +1 does not give [Lotleth Troll](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lotleth Troll) a +1/+1 counter. The discard is forced due to the planeswalker's ability; you have no option to discard that card to pay the cost of Troll's activated ability.
posts.html:
